name: Dolmio Extra Spicy Bolognese Sauce 500G
description: Have you had you DOLMIO® day? What did you think?
Let us know  The DOLMIO® family loves to talk.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Number_Of_Uses>4 Serves 4</Number_Of_Uses><Preparation_and_Usage>Papa loves to cook Bolognese.You know why? It's easy! Just brown your mince for at least 5 mins, until the juices run clear. Add DOLMIO® Bolognese sauce, bring back to the boil whilst gently stirring. Serve other spaghetti and the family will be happy in no time.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
PromotionDescription: 50 extra points on any Tesco Healthy Living cooking sauce 500g jar Includes bolognese pasta sauce
